name: Health Restoration Potion
description: A potion that restores a small amount of health.
looks: The potion is a small glass vial filled with a glowing blue liquid.

name: Speed Boots
description: Boots that enhance the wearer's speed and movement.
looks: A pair of sleek, black leather boots with silver trim.

name: Dagger
description: A small, sharp dagger used for close-quarters combat.
looks: The dagger has a bronze hilt and a steel blade, with intricate designs and engravings.

special_weapon_skills.dagger_proficiency: Increases proficiency and damage dealt with daggers.

name: Speed Elixir
description: An elixir that enhances the user's speed for a short period of time.
looks: The elixir is a small glass flask filled with a sparkling purple liquid.

name: Magic Wand
description: A wand that is used to cast magical spells.
looks: The wand is made of polished oak wood, with intricate carvings and a crystal on top.

special_effects.Increased Spell Power: Increases the power of spells cast with this wand
special_effects.Spell Focus: Improves accuracy and effectiveness of spells cast with this wand
special_effects.Mana Regeneration: Regenerates mana over time while equipped

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll that contains the fireball spell.
looks: The scroll is made of aged parchment and sealed with a red wax seal.

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll that contains the knowledge to cast the Fireball spell.
looks: The scroll is made of aged parchment and is bound with a red ribbon.

special_effects.fireball: Allows the user to cast the Fireball spell

name: Lucky Necklace
description: A necklace that brings good luck to the wearer.
looks: The necklace is made of a delicate chain with a small pendant in the shape of a four-leaf clover.

name: Journeyman's Bow
description: A well-crafted bow suitable for a skilled archer.
looks: The bow is made of polished wood and has intricate carvings along its length. It is adorned with a string made of strong, woven fibers.

special_weapon_skils.archery: Increases accuracy and damage with bows.

name: Invisibility Potion
description: A potion that grants temporary invisibility to the user.
looks: The potion is a small glass vial filled with a transparent liquid.

special_effects.Invisibility: Grants temporary invisibility to the user
